Name: Gems of Magic: Lost Family
About the game: This magical Match 3 Adventure makes you work. Simple at the start, but quite challenging when you are further in the game. Enjoy the beautiful graphics, and use the power ups sagaciously. Save the colorful creatures of the lost family in the magic forest by solving the puzzles until their freedom. Please take a look at the Enchanted Forest, where magical creatures lived peacefully together in a beautiful surrounding. But now the Fuzzy family is in great trouble. The hurricane took the Fuzzy family, every one? No, a Fuzzy member of the family stayed behind, and is now desperately in search of his family! Can you help this magical creature to save his family in this incredible adventure? Make use of the unique boosters, avoid the spooky enemy which tries to block you during the game, enjoy the hand drawn scenes, and free the Fuzzy family through 90 challenging levels
